item.scythe.scythe.tooltip:
Right click to use BLOOD STREAM, the scythe's ultimate.
Summons a projectile which deals damage, REMOVES all EFFECTS from the shooter and APPLIES them to hit ENTITIES.

Costs the shooter 4 health points.
item.scythe.fire_scythe.tooltip:
Right click to use TETHERING INFERNO, the scythe's ultimate.
Summons multiple projectiles which BURN everything they hit, deal damage to hit entities and make them LEVITATE.

The shooter will be set on fire for 4 to 8 seconds.
